titleStmt.title: The Christianity of the people commonly called Quakers asserted against the unjust charge of their being no Christians, upon several questions relating to those matters wherein their Christian belief is questioned.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Northcott, in George-yard, in Lumbardstreet,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Whitehead by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
